video.title: Lost Girl
video.synopsis: Discovering she's a succubus who sustains herself by feeding on the sexual energy of humans, seductive Bo sets out on a journey to understand herself.

episodes.synopsis: Bo's impulsive decision to protect a young woman in jeopardy has unexpected consequences: Bo is swept up into the secret world of the Fae.
episodes.title: It's a Fae, Fae, Fae, Fae World

episodes.synopsis: Fresh from realizing that she is a Fae, Bo is approached by a real Will o' the Wisp. The jewels he's collected over the centuries has been stolen!
episodes.title: Where There's a Will, There's a Fae

episodes.synopsis: Bo and Kenzi go undercover at a college to find a missing coed. The women dig into the school's sorority system and find a surprising Fae connection.
episodes.title: Oh Kappa, My Kappa

episodes.synopsis: When a Fury with an unfaithful spouse tries to hire Bo to kill her husband's mistress, Bo instead takes the side of the unsuspecting human woman.
episodes.title: Faetal Attraction

episodes.synopsis: Bo is coerced into solving how a human scammed a Dark Fae bookie. Things get creepy when she learns the con artist is a Fae that can inhabit corpses.
episodes.title: Dead Lucky

episodes.synopsis: While tagging after Lauren and Bo in the Fae world, Kenzi becomes ill (and incredibly grossed-out) when she inadvertently eats some toxic human soup.
episodes.title: Food for Thought

episodes.synopsis: When Kenzi runs a scam and does a spiritual cleanse of a house where a murder-suicide took place, she inadvertently brings home a vicious Fae spider.
episodes.title: ArachnoFaebia

episodes.synopsis: Bo gets details on someone who might know about her mother, but the trail leads to a death row inmate who claims not to know anything about Bo.
episodes.title: Vexed

episodes.synopsis: A fun-filled Fae "high holiday" turns potentially deadly when a Banshee wail predicts the death of someone in Trick's bar within the next 12 hours.
episodes.title: Fae Day

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a sex-related murder case, Bo meets Saskia, a sensuous Succubus who has much to teach her, and the two become fast friends.
episodes.title: The Mourning After

episodes.synopsis: When Dyson wakes up bloody and without any memory of the last eight hours, he finds himself accused of murder and takes refuge in Trick's bar.
episodes.title: Faetal Justice

episodes.synopsis: Bo and Dyson go undercover as a married power couple at a swanky country club to help an old friend from Kenzi's criminal past.
episodes.title: (Dis)members Only

episodes.synopsis: Bo has finally learned the truth about her mother, and that those closest to her have been keeping secrets about her past.
episodes.title: Blood Lines

episodes.synopsis: In the season opener, a nomadic Fae sideshow comes to town looking to exploit the chaos wrought by the bombing of the Light Fae headquarters.
episodes.title: Something Wicked This Fae Comes

episodes.synopsis: The hunt for the new Ash is on. A traditional Stag Hunt is held, and the candidate who successfully tracks and kills the Stag becomes the next Ash.
episodes.title: I Fought the Fae (and the Fae Won)

episodes.synopsis: As Bo tries to accept the new terms of her relationship with Dyson, she investigates an apartment complex whose tenants seem to have lost their minds.
episodes.title: Scream a Little Dream

episodes.synopsis: In a move of sisterly solidarity, Kenzi drunkenly invokes the Russian hag Baba Yaga to curse Dyson for his behavior towards Bo.
episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Bo and Dyson team up to track down a stolen Mongolian Death Worm on behalf of Dyson's old wolf pack mate.
episodes.title: BrotherFae of the Wolves

episodes.synopsis: The Morrigan enlists Bo's help to find a tortured graffiti artist under her employ. The young painter has killed a Dark Fae.
episodes.title: It's Better to Burn Out Than Fae Away

episodes.synopsis: Bo is happy for the distraction provided by an assembly of strippers who help break an accused cop-killer out of the police station.
episodes.title: Fae Gone Wild

episodes.synopsis: Trick's dear friend seeks his assistance when his ballet dancer husband goes missing -- or rather, his ballet dancer husband's corpse.
episodes.title: Death Didn't Become Him

episodes.synopsis: A night out at the Dal goes awry when an insane trickster spikes the beer with a substance that transfers Bo out of her body.
episodes.title: Original Skin

episodes.synopsis: Bo joins the brutal world of underground fighting to help a human competitor juiced up on Fae "steroids" that are sending him on blackout rages.
episodes.title: Raging Fae

episodes.synopsis: When rich young humans start turning up dead, Bo agrees to go undercover to help Dyson find the Fae responsible.
episodes.title: Can't See the Fae-Rest..

episodes.synopsis: Bo enlists Dyson's help to find an artifact she believes will release Lauren from her life of servitude to the Fae.
episodes.title: Masks

episodes.synopsis: When Trick takes matters into his own hands to foresee the future, he runs the risk of revealing too much to the wrong Fae.
episodes.title: Barometz. Trick. Pressure

episodes.synopsis: While Bo continues to ponder the Ash's shocking proposal, she agrees to his interim request: kidnap a Genie.
episodes.title: Midnight Lamp

episodes.synopsis: What Bo uncovers while investigating the mysterious disappearance of human backpackers threatens her own fine physique.
episodes.title: Table for Fae

episodes.synopsis: Bo goes undercover as a high school teacher to investigate a mysterious case, and Kenzi soon regrets agreeing to help her.
episodes.title: School's Out

episodes.synopsis: Things heat up when Bo tangles with Fae politics in an attempt to save some very important people. Meanwhile, Kenzi does a favor for Hale.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Fae'd with Fire

episodes.synopsis: Kenzi and Trick must race to save Bo from the fallout of a steamy night gone awry before it binds the Succubus for a millennium.
episodes.title: Fae-nted Love

episodes.synopsis: Bo confronts a very powerful Fae, uncertain whether she can trust The Ash's counsel. The coming war takes its first casualties.
episodes.title: Truth and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: The Ash takes drastic action against the threat bearing down on him, which in turn convinces Bo to make a potentially life-threatening decision.
episodes.title: Lachlan's Gambit

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of emotional losses, Trick reveals his deepest secret to Bo. Bo realizes there is no turning back and must battle for the fate of the Fae.
episodes.title: Into the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Bo must lead her friends into battle ahead of schedule when her hand is forced by their enemy. A revelation from Dyson provides Bo with ammunition.
episodes.title: Flesh and Blood

episodes.synopsis: A lawless Bo runs amok and lands herself inside Hecuba Prison, where she works with ward doctor Lauren to investigate a strange disappearance.
episodes.title: Caged Fae

episodes.synopsis: Kenzi and Bo find a den of Alligator Fae when they go looking for Kenzi's friend.
episodes.title: SubterrFaenean

episodes.synopsis: Bo’s houseguest, Vex, unwittingly brings "greetings" from a vengeful Morrigan -- sparking a chaotic role-reversal.
episodes.title: ConFaegion

episodes.synopsis: Bo goes undercover to get to the bottom of people believing that they have become the heroes of their childhood dreams, with fatal consequences.
episodes.title: Fae-de To Black

episodes.synopsis: When humans start dissolving into piles of goo, Bo uncovers a nefarious twist to a sexy key club.
episodes.title: Faes Wide Shut

episodes.synopsis: As Bo spirals out of control, her friends have to intervene. Bo accepts help from an unlikely source to save a loved one.
episodes.title: The Kenzi Scale

episodes.synopsis: Trick calls in an expert to help Bo with her coming dawning, but Bo isn't thrilled about what she asks her to do.
episodes.title: There's Bo Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: Tamsin takes Bo to lunch, but it turns into a scavenger hunt in a lawless Dark Fae territory.
episodes.title: Fae-ge Against The Machine

episodes.synopsis: Bo's Dawning has arrived, and she must face both physical and psychological challenges so she would not become Underfae.
episodes.title: Ceremony

episodes.synopsis: Bo, Dyson and Kenzie go undercover to catch a serial killer who preys on at-risk youth.
episodes.title: Delinquents

episodes.synopsis: Bo and Kenzie go undercover in Shady Grove when a babysitter asks for their help to determine what happened to her employer.
episodes.title: Adventures In Fae-bysitting

episodes.synopsis: After an attack at the Dal, a group member's life is left hanging in the balance. Meanwhile, the Morrigan attempts to instigate a Fae clash.
episodes.title: Hail, Hale

episodes.synopsis: Against great odds, Bo attempts to rescue loved ones. Meanwhile, Kenzi comes to a realization about Hale.
episodes.title: Those Who Wander

episodes.synopsis: The new Morrigan permanently erases certain memories, turning members of the group into strangers, and only a magical compass will set things right.
episodes.title: In Memoriam

episodes.synopsis: After finding a girl who is actually Tamsin reincarnated, Dyson tries to find Bo and trails her to a death train. Hale admits his feelings for Kenzi.
episodes.title: Sleeping Beauty School

episodes.synopsis: After her escape from the death train, Bo discovers a house where the apparent domestic violence hides a more sinister reality.
episodes.title: Lovers. Apart.

episodes.synopsis: The clubhouse is robbed, and the group makes a deal with the thief to retrieve their property. Meanwhile, Lauren reveals her troubled past.
episodes.title: Turn to Stone

episodes.synopsis: When Bo finally learns the truth of her identity, she seeks an audience with the leader of the dark fae, with some surprising results.
episodes.title: Let the Dark Times Roll

episodes.synopsis: An opera singing fae named Ianka offers to exchange the secrets she holds about Bo's past for her freedom, but setting her free is no easy task.
episodes.title: Of All the Gin Joints

episodes.synopsis: When the Una Mens capture Dyson, intending to execute him, Bo seeks help from an Oracle, Trick, and Lauren to enter his memories and save him.
episodes.title: La Fae Époque

episodes.synopsis: As the crew celebrates the holidays, Bo realizes that she and Tamsin discover that they're in a time loop, repeating the same day over and over.
episodes.title: Groundhog Fae

episodes.synopsis: Bo opens the jar given to her by Kenzi, releasing a crow named Hugin, who ensnares Bo in his plans for revenge against the brother who trapped him.
episodes.title: Destiny's Child

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Bo's revelation, the group takes on an undercover mission at a cryptic organization. Bo, meanwhile, looks for clues to her identity.
episodes.title: Waves

episodes.synopsis: Tamsin's mentor, Acacia, returns to help thwart a Revenant attack on Bo, and Trick shares some stories about his father with Vex.
episodes.title: End of a Line

episodes.synopsis: A knight appears before Bo, claiming his allegiance to her, his queen. He also reveals prophecies that may at last solve the riddle of her origin.
episodes.title: Origin

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Bo confronts an impossible choice when the salvation of her entire world requires a heartbreaking sacrifice.
episodes.title: Dark Horse
